name: ts-skeleton-plugin
description: A Typescript skeleton for writing Aurelia plugins.
author: Paolo Furini <info@nexbit.it>

scripts.build:compile: concurrently "node_modules/.bin/tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/amd" "./node_modules/.bin/tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/commonjs --module commonjs" "./node_modules/.bin/tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/native-modules --module es2015" "./node_modules/.bin/tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/system --module system" "./node_modules/.bin/tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outDir dist/es2015 --target es2015 --module es2015" || true
scripts.prebuild:doc: rimraf 'doc/api.json' && rimraf 'dist/doc-temp/**' && cross-env ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --project tsconfig.build.json --outFile dist/doc-temp/${npm-package-name}.js && node doc/shape-defs
scripts.build:doc: cross-env ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --json doc/api.json --excludeExternals --includeDeclarations --mode modules --target ES6 --name ${npm-package-name}-docs --ignoreCompilerErrors --tsconfig doc/tsconfig.json dist/doc-temp/
